alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:11PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Shoshone County through 315 PM PDT... At 210 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Osburn. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kellogg, Pinehurst, Osburn, Smelterville, Wardner, Prichard, and Silver Mountain. This includes Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 45 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
